mapper.select: select users.`id`,items.name,item_id,items.`uri`,items.`pid` from (users LEFT JOIN user_item ON users.id = user_item.`user_id` ) INNER JOIN items ON items.`id` = user_item.`item_id`
SELECT users.`id`,history.`history_video_id`,history.`time` FROM history,users WHERE users.`id` = history.`user_id`
SELECT users.`id`,collection.`category`,collection.`collection_time`,collection.`collection_video_id`,collection.`state` FROM collection, users WHERE collection.`user_id` = users.`id`
